Question: NCHC High Performance Computing Division CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Intel Corporation

Intel Core 14th Gen HX-series mobile processors

 - Equipped with Intel Core i9-14900HX
 - Eight Performance-cores and 16 Efficient-cores
 - Superior single- and multi-thread performance
 - Ideal for high-end notebooks and AI PCs
 - Enhanced connectivity features
 - Demonstrated 17% higher average FPS compared to AMD 7945HX3D
 - 51% faster multitasking workflow in tests with Epic Games Unreal Engine

Introduced at CES 2024.
Summary_cn:
英特尔公司

英特尔酷睿第14代HX系列移动处理器

- 配备英特尔酷睿i9-14900HX
- 八个性能核心和16个高效核心
- 卓越的单线程和多线程性能
- 非常适合高端笔记本电脑和人工智能电脑
- 增强的连接功能
- 在与AMD 7945HX3D的测试中，平均帧率比AMD高17%
- 在与Epic Games虚幻引擎的测试中，多任务工作流速度提升了51%

在2024年的CES上推出。
